name: Super Dungeon Boy (itch)
description:
2D platform game focused on intense combat against enemies and exploring secret areas in dark dungeons full of dangers. Help the boy face all the challenges and find the way out of this maze of caves.

But do not be in a hurry, for there are many secrets and riches to be won.

Fight or die!

Running will not save you. You need to confront your enemies and move forward safely. Or run and face everyone at once, it's your choice!

Explore!

The dark caves hide many secrets. Test your explorer skills and find treasures in every dark corner of the caves. Be sure to look under each stone!
